name: SSL/TLS Security
description: Analyzes SSL/TLS configuration including weak ciphers, protocols, and certificate validation
cwe_name: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
remediation: Disable SSLv3, TLS 1.0, TLS 1.1. Use TLS 1.2+ with strong cipher suites. Enable HSTS. Use valid certificates from trusted CAs.
